tariffs_step1_prompt: Step 1/4: Server Selection Choose the data center where your userbot will live. Closer servers usually perform a bit faster.
tariffs_step2_prompt: Step 2/4: Tariff Selection Choose the power for your userbot. More RAM allows for more modules and features.
tariffs_step3_prompt: Step 3/4: Image Selection Choose the type of userbot. Hikka and Heroku are popular forks with different feature sets.
tariffs_step4_prompt_title: Step 4/4: Order Review Please check all the details before creation.
tariffs_step4_prompt_footer: Confirm the UserBot creation. The specified amount will be debited from your balance.
free_tariff_verification_prompt: âš ï¸ Verification Required! To prevent abuse, getting a free tariff requires a quick check through our website. It won't take more than a minute.
my_userbots_no_bots:
You don't have any userbots yet.

Create your first assistant in the 'Tariffs' section to get started!
my_userbots_select_bot: Select a userbot from the list to go to its control panel:
orphaned_container_warning: Attention! The server {server_name} hosting this UserBot is no longer available. Some management functions are limited.
not_found_explanation: âš ï¸ What does 'Not Found' status mean? This means the container record exists in the database, but the container itself is not found on the server. Possible reasons: - An error occurred during a server change. - The container was deleted by an administrator. - A server failure occurred. Solution: Please try to reinstall the UserBot. If that doesn't help, contact support.
reinstall_confirm_text: âš ï¸ Are you sure you want to reinstall the UserBot? This action will delete the current container and create a new one with the same image and tariff. All data (sessions, settings) will be permanently destroyed.
reinstall_error: âŒ An error occurred during reinstallation. Please try again or contact support.
change_image_prompt: ğŸ–¼ï¸ Select a new image for your userbot. The current one will be completely replaced.
confirm_image_change_prompt: Are you sure you want to change the image to {image_name}? All session data will be lost.
change_server_prompt: Select a new server to move to. âš ï¸ WARNING: All unsaved data (sessions, logs) will be LOST.
confirm_server_change_prompt: Are you sure you want to move the container to the {server_name} server? This may take a while.
change_name_prompt: Enter a new name for your UserBot (4-29 chars, a-z, A-Z, 0-9, -, _, . only):
operation_fee_text: âš ï¸ Attention: A commission of {fee:.2f} RUB ({percent}% of the tariff price) will be charged for this operation.
operation_is_free: âœ¨ Great! You have a bonus for this operation, so it will be performed for free.
extend_prompt: â³ Choose a subscription extension plan. The longer the period, the bigger your savings!
extend_free_not_allowed: Free tariffs cannot be extended. Please change the tariff or create a new UserBot.
upgrade_cpu_prompt: Choose how much you want to increase the CPU limit. Each 10% step costs 10 RUB.
extend_cpu_surcharge_info: Important: You have an active CPU upgrade to {cpu_percent}%. The extra charge for it will be {cpu_cost:.2f} RUB/month and will be included in the renewal price.
upgrade_ram_prompt: Choose how much you want to increase the RAM limit. Every 100MB costs 15 RUB.
extend_ram_surcharge_info: Important: You have an active RAM upgrade to {actual_ram}MB. The extra charge for it will be {ram_cost:.2f} RUB/month and will be included in the renewal price.
delete_confirm_step1_text: âš ï¸ You are about to delete the container! This action is irreversible. The container will not be restored, even after a request in the topic.
delete_confirm_step2_text: â€¼ï¸ FINAL WARNING â€¼ï¸ Are you sure you want to delete the container and everything associated with it? Funds for the remaining time will not be refunded.
transfer_confirm_text: âš ï¸ Are you sure you want to transfer this container? A unique one-time link will be generated. Anyone who clicks this link will become the new owner of the container with all the remaining time. This action is irreversible after the link is used!
transfer_link_message: âœ… Transfer link created! Send this link to the person you want to transfer the container to. The link is valid for 15 minutes and can only be used once. Your container is now in 'Pending Transfer' mode. You can cancel the transfer at any time from the management menu.
transfer_canceled: âœ… Transfer has been canceled. Your container is fully active again.
transfer_claim_success_new_owner: ğŸ‰ Congratulations! You have successfully received the container {container_name}. It is now available in the 'My UserBots' section.
transfer_claim_success_old_owner: ğŸ”” Your container {container_name} has been successfully transferred to the user {new_owner_name}.
inline_bot_selected_text: Bot selected: {name}. Click the button above to manage it.
get_logs_prompt: Enter the number of log lines you want to retrieve (1-5000):
get_logs_empty: ğŸ“‹ Logs for this container are empty.
get_logs_file_caption: Last requested logs are in the attached file.
